bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Campbell County was formed in 1781 from Bedford County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1792-1830, of Campbell County include the wills of John Thompson (1792) and Robert Wilson (1830) and the bill in the chancery cause Archibald Bolling, Jr., versus Richard G. Haden (1824.)

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
